onboarding.title: How would you like to get started?

premiumModels.title: Premium models
premiumModels.description: Sign up. New users get $5 in credits

byok.title: Bring my own Key
byok.description: Advanced. Use your own account or subscription

welcome.introText1: Kilo Code is a free, open source AI coding agent.
welcome.introText2: It works with the latest AI models like Claude Opus 4.5, Gemini 3 Pro, GPT-5.2, and 450+ more.
welcome.introText3: Create a free account and get $20 in bonus credits when you top-up for the first time.

lowCreditWarning.lowBalance: Your Kilo Code balance is low

memoryWarning.message: Memory usage is at {{percentage}}%. Please restart your IDE to prevent crashes.

invalidModel.alphaPeriodEnded: ðŸŽ‰ The alpha period for {{model}} has ended! Change to a different model to continue.
invalidModel.notAllowedForTeam: âš ï¸ Your organization does not allow use of the {{model}} model. Change to a different model to continue.
invalidModel.modelUnavailable: âš ï¸ The model {{model}} is unavailable. Change to a different model to continue.

unauthorizedError.title: You need to sign in to use the {{modelId}} model
unauthorizedError.message: Sign in or create an account to access over 500 models, use credits at cost, or bring your own key.

promotionError.title: You need to sign up to keep going
promotionError.message: Sign up for free to continue and explore 500 other models. Takes 2 minutes, no credit card required. Or come back later.

pricing.costUnknownDescription: The API Provider did not provide any cost data or the request was canceled.
pricing.freeModelsLink: Discover free and budget model options

imageWarnings.modelNoImageSupport: Images are not supported by the current model.
imageWarnings.maxImagesReached: Maximum of 20 images per message. Remove some images to add more.

provider.loginForPremiumModels: Log in to access premium models & features

providerRouting.title: Provider Routing
providerRouting.createOrganization: Create an Organization to Manage Provider Routing

modelInfo.averageKiloCodeCost: This is the average actual spent for Kilo Code using this model over the last week. It may be lower than the listed price due to prompt cache utilization.

table.context: The endpoint can process this number of tokens (input + output).
table.inputPrice: Cost per million tokens for the prompt.
table.outputPrice: Cost per million tokens for the completion.
table.cacheReadPrice: Cost per million tokens for reading from the cache.
table.cacheWritePrice: Cost per million tokens for writing to the cache.

allowVeryLargeReads.label: Allow very large file reads
allowVeryLargeReads.description: When enabled, Kilo Code will perform very large file or MCP output reads even if there is a high chance of overflowing the context window (content size >80% of context window).

systemNotifications.label: Enable System Notifications
systemNotifications.description: When enabled, Kilo Code will send system notifications for important events like task completion or errors.
systemNotifications.testMessage: This is a test notification from Kilo Code.

apiConfigId.label: API Configuration
apiConfigId.description: Select which API configuration to use for generating terminal commands. Leave as 'Use Current Configuration' to use your default settings.

codeIndex.embeddingBatchSizeDescription: Number of code segments to batch together for embedding generation and vector store upserts. Higher values can improve indexing speed but may increase memory usage. Lower values reduce memory usage but may slow down indexing.
codeIndex.scannerMaxBatchRetriesDescription: Maximum number of times to retry a failed batch during directory scanning. Higher values increase resilience to transient errors but may slow down indexing if errors persist. Lower values fail faster but may skip content on temporary issues.

condense.wantsToCondense: Kilo Code wants to condense your conversation

profile.title: Profile
profile.createOrganization: Create an Organization to Track Detailed Usage

description.rules: Rules allow you to provide Kilo Code with instructions it should follow in all modes and for all prompts. They are a persistent way to include context and preferences for all conversations in your workspace or globally.
description.workflows: Workflows are a prepared template for a conversation. Workflows can allow you to define prompts you use frequently, and can include a series of steps to guide Kilo Code through repetitive tasks, such as deploying a service or submitting a PR. To invoke a workflow, type

validation.invalidFileExtension: Only .md, .txt, or no file extension allowed

ideaSuggestionsBox.tryOneOfThese: Try one of these ideas to get started:
ideaSuggestionsBox.suggestionText: <suggestionButton>Click here</suggestionButton> for a cool idea, then tap on <sendIcon /> and watch me do magic!

ideas.idea1: Make a spinning, glowing 3D sphere that responds to mouse movements. Make the app work in the browser.
ideas.idea2: Create a portfolio website for a Python software developer
ideas.idea3: Create a financial app mockup in the browser. Then test if it works
ideas.idea4: Create a directory website containing the best AI video generation models currently
ideas.idea5: Create a CSS gradient generator that exports custom stylesheets and shows a live preview
ideas.idea6: Generate cards that reveal dynamic content beautifully when hovered over
ideas.idea7: Create a calming interactive starfield that moves with mouse gestures

toolCallStyle.title: Tool Call Style
toolCallStyle.description: Choose how tool calls are formatted in the system prompt. JSON is currently experimental and mostly intended for users interested in contributing to its development.

enableAutoTrigger.label: Auto-trigger Suggestions
enableAutoTrigger.description: Automatically show inline code suggestions when you pause typing.

autoTriggerDelay.label: Auto Trigger Delay
autoTriggerDelay.description: The delay in seconds before suggestions appear after you pause typing. A shorter delay means quicker suggestions, but may be more resource-intensive.

enableSmartInlineTaskKeybinding.label: Trigger on Keybinding ({{keybinding}})
enableSmartInlineTaskKeybinding.description: Press {{keybinding}} to request a code suggestion at your cursor position. <DocsLink>Edit shortcut</DocsLink>

enableChatAutocomplete.label: Enable Chat Autocomplete
enableChatAutocomplete.description: Show completions as you type in the chat input. Press Tab to accept suggestions.

snooze.label: Snooze Suggestions
snooze.description: Temporarily pause suggestions for a specified duration.

noModelConfigured.title: No autocomplete model configured
noModelConfigured.description: To enable autocomplete, add a profile with one of these supported providers:
noModelConfigured.learnMore: Learn more about autocomplete setup â†’

noCredits.title: No credits in your account
noCredits.description: Your Kilo Code account has no credits. To use autocomplete, please add credits to your account.

settings.configureAutocompleteProfile: Use any model by going to profiles and configuring a Profile of the Profile Type Autocomplete.

virtualProvider.title: Virtual Quota Fallback Provider Settings
virtualProvider.description: Configure a list of profiles each with their own quota limits. When one provider's quota limits are reached, the next profile in the list will be used until none remain.
virtualProvider.noProfilesAvailable: No profiles available. Please configure at least one non-virtual provider profile first.
virtualProvider.dangerZoneDescription: These actions are destructive and cannot be undone.
virtualProvider.confirmClearDescription: This will permanently delete all stored usage data for virtual providers. This action cannot be undone.

mcp.description: These MCP servers are maintained by the community. Click <1>here</1> to edit your own MCP settings.

modes.description: These modes are available from the community. Click <1>here</1> to edit your own custom modes.

skills.description: Browse and discover skills from the community. Skills provide specialized instructions for specific tasks.

modes.shareModesNewBanner: New: Share modes by creating an organization

deviceAuth.title: Sign in to Kilo Code
deviceAuth.step1: Open the following URL on your browser
deviceAuth.step2: Verify the code and authorize this device on your browser
deviceAuth.scanQr: Or scan this QR code with your phone
deviceAuth.unknownError: An error occurred. Please try again.

setupPopover.title: Speech-to-Text
setupPopover.description: Speech-to-text is unavailable. Speech-to-text requires both FFmpeg and a valid OpenAI provider configured. <moreInfoLink>Click here for more information</moreInfoLink>.
setupPopover.openAiReason: You need a valid OpenAI provider with an API key to use voice transcription.
setupPopover.ffmpegReason: You need FFmpeg installed. <ffmpegLink>Click here</ffmpegLink> to have Kilo help you install FFmpeg.

microphone.label: Microphone
microphone.description: Select the microphone device for speech-to-text

skills.description: Skills provide specialized instructions for specific tasks. They are automatically applied when relevant to your request.

deleteDialog.title: Delete Skill
deleteDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete the skill "{{skillName}}"? This action cannot be undone.
